A Birthday Note

Happy birthday to my dearest honey üéÇ

There have been 7,670 days since you were born. We have been together 449 of those days, or about ~5.85% of your life (so far).

The past 1.23 years have offered profound growth for me. I found the most loving, devoted, and beautiful girl of my dreams. But I‚Äôve also faced the most humbling, painful, and unrelenting sickness. I never imagined that small-town life in Pelican Town CW would be so dramatic.


Years from now, our past will be a story ‚Äì

A story of long days and lonely nights,

Hard work and lack of sleep.

We‚Äôll live each day having intimately known

The pain of being apart,

We‚Äôll appreciate and embrace our time together,

Knowing how lucky we are

To have made it through,

And we‚Äôll find solace in

The promise of a future together.


We have made countless memories since we first met. They are what got me through the toughest moments when you were away.

Your birthday gifts this year are intended to craft memorable moments while we recover, help us reflect on our journey thus far, and prepare our souls for the odyssey ahead.

I love you, and I wish you the luckiest of birthdays. ‚ù§Ô∏è
